General.Name: Golden Arrow Merger Corp Unit
General.Description: Golden Arrow Merger Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses in the healthcare and healthcare-related infrastructure industries in the United States and other developed countries. Golden Arrow Merger Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 10 East 53rd Street, New York, NY, United States, 10022
